title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 480.2 - Filing of changes in procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 480.2 - Filing of changes in procedures

State Regulations

Each such electric, gas and steam corporation shall file
with this commission any change in these procedures at least 30 days before
they are to be effective, unless otherwise authorized by this
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
480.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
